Title: Wilhelm His Junior and his bundle
Abstract: © 2016 Elsevier Inc.We have reviewed the evidence relative to the initial description of the penetrating atrioventricular bundle, seeking to determine whether Wilhelm His Junior is deserving of his eponym.
